advice.text: Review the task: the program reads one integer N (1..1000) and prints the sum of its divisors in the given message format.
Think of the top-level flow: set up variables, read N, iterate to find divisors and accumulate their sum, then print the result.
Inside main, write 3â€“5 high-level comments as steps (e.g., declare variables; read input; loop to add divisors; print output) before you start coding.
